About the job
Role Responsibilities: 
End-to-End Troubleshooting: Perform comprehensive troubleshooting to diagnose and fix issues related to software configuration, performance, and integration.
Bug Fixing: Identify, analyze, and resolve coding bugs in a timely manner.
App Configuration Management: Review and update app configurations to ensure optimal performance and compatibility.
Integration Support: Assist in resolving integration issues with other systems and platforms.
Customer Support: Provide technical support to customers and address their concerns effectively.
Documentation: Maintain detailed documentation of issues, solutions, and best practices.
Collaboration: Work closely with development, QA, and support teams to ensure seamless software operation.

 Requirement
Bachelor’s degree in information technology, Computer Science, or a related field.
Minimum of 2 years of of relevant professional working experience.
Proven experience in software development and bug fixing.
Strong troubleshooting skills with the ability to diagnose and resolve complex issues.
Familiarity with software configuration management and performance monitoring tools.
Experience with Node.js, React, Kafka, Keycloak, MQTT, Microservices, Docker, Kubernetes, Podman, MongoDB, and IBM MQ.
Available for 24/7 standby.
Ready to work OT and in shift roles if needed.

Founded in 1995, Beyondsoft is an integrated provider of IT solutions and consultancy. Over the years, we have strategically expanded our footprint, establishing more than 40+ trusted global delivery centers across Asia, South and North America, as well as Europe.

Our vision is to lead the world in delivering top-notch IT solutions and consulting services by integrating world-class business solutions from our partners for clients worldwide. We are committed to reshaping 21st-century businesses, empowering our customers to revolutionize their operations through the utilization of cutting-edge technologies.

In 2007, Beyondsoft International (Singapore) Pte. Ltd. was established, later becoming the international headquarters for overseas markets in September 2015. Our unwavering commitment is to provide comprehensive solutions that generate commercial value for our clients, fostering continuous business development.

Beyondsoft stands out as a leading IT solutions and consultancy Multinational Corporation in Singapore, having earned certifications such as ISO 9001:2015, ISO 20000-1:2011, and ISO 27001:2013. Additionally, we support Responsible Business Alliance initiatives, have achieved a commendable maturity level in CMMI, and received the bizSAFE accreditation launched by the Ministry of Manpower (MOM) in Singapore.
